channel.title: R Programming on Statistics II
channel.description: Recent content in R Programming on Statistics II

item.title: Intro to R and RStudio
item.description: Assignment Complete Lab0 from the DATA606 R package. The following commands will copy the lab template to your current working directory. Read the markdown file answering the questions within the document. DATA606::startLab('Lab1') Readings The preface and introduction of R for Data Science book. History and Overview of R chapter from R Programming for Data Science book by Roger Peng. Thieme, N. (2018). R generation. Significance, 15(4), 14-19.

item.title: Data Visualization
item.description: Readings Chapter 1 of R for Data Science book. Gelman, A., Pasarica, C., & Dodhia, R. (2002). Let’s practice what we preach: Turning tables into graphcs. The American Statistician, 56(2), 121-130.
